body: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

> Thanks for such a great work . I have trained a custom model using yolov3-tiny model on a single class with input shape 416. I have get the best.pt and last.pt model after running the training. I have converted these model to .weights file using the
> ## Darknet Conversion
> 
> ```shell
> # convert cfg/pytorch model to darknet weights
> $ python3  -c "from models import *; convert('cfg/yolov3-tiny-1cls.cfg', 'weights/best.pt')"
> Success: converted 'weights/best.pt' to 'weights/bestp.weights'
> ```
> 
> It is converted successfully But Now I am unable to run on the darknet inference.It is giving me error
> 
> ```
> conv_weights = conv_weights.reshape(conv_shape).transpose([2, 3, 1, 0])
> ```
> 
> ValueError: cannot reshape array of size 767781 into shape (256,384,3,3)
> 
> Please look at the issue. The file size of orignal tiny yolov3 weights and pytorch converted .weights file are not same.Thanks

请问怎么解决的，怎么转换模型pt  --weights

> Thanks for such a great work . I have trained a custom model using yolov3-tiny model on a single class with input shape 416. I have get the best.pt and last.pt model after running the training. I have converted these model to .weights file using the

Hello, how to transform Pt model to weights

@WANGCHAO1996 I have convert using following method

1- Clone this one repository (it is not the master repository, it is archieved repository which is not longer availible in master branch.It have darknet conversion section on the repository,follow this one) "https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/tree/archive"
2- Go inside this cloned repository and run the following command 
```
python3  -c "from models import *; convert('cfg/yolov3-tiny-1cls.cfg', 'weights/best.pt')"
```
Change the input path of the model and output path.

You should check your configuration file,is it correctly configured for the single class or not.There are different networks configuration files for  
- yolov3-tiny
- yolov3-spp
- yolov3-spp-ultralytics

![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51087601/101134642-ab543d00-3645-11eb-9841-79724f5c9692.png)
These are my custom names, data and files. Do you need to modify the paths of these two files when converting a single class model

Look at command 

``
python3  -c "from models import *; convert('cfg/yolov3-tiny-1cls.cfg', 'weights/best.pt')"
``
1- It need path of the cfg which you have used for the training of model. 
2- The path of your trained .pt weights.

Nothing more is needed for the conversion of .pt ---> .weights file.

obj.data : It is used in training for locating the path of your training data and classes.
obj.names: It is used in training and testing for label mapping to index.
So these are used in training and testing, So these are not needed in conversion of models.

> Look at command
> 
> `python3 -c "from models import *; convert('cfg/yolov3-tiny-1cls.cfg', 'weights/best.pt')"`
> 1- It need path of the cfg which you have used for the training of model.
> 2- The path of your trained .pt weights.
> 
> Nothing more is needed for the conversion of .pt ---> .weights file.
> 
> obj.data : It is used in training for locating the path of your training data and classes.
> obj.names: It is used in training and testing for label mapping to index.
> So these are used in training and testing, So these are not needed in conversion of models.

They have changed the repository structure recently, I do not work with this recent master branch,cannot say anything more.You can consult @glenn-jocher ,he is managing this repository.

@NaeemKhan333 @WANGCHAO1996 previous repository is now archive branch, and continues to be backward compatible with darknet. New master has been created that is forward compatible with YOLOv5. The two branches (and models trained with each branch) are not compatible with each other.

BRANCH NOTICE: The [ultralytics/yolov3](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3) repository is now divided into two branches:
* [Master branch](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/tree/master): Forward-compatible with all [YOLOv5](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5) models and methods (**recommended**).
```bash
$ git clone https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3  # master branch (default)
```
* [Archive branch](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/tree/archive): Backwards-compatible with original [darknet](https://pjreddie.com/darknet/) *.cfg models (⚠️ no longer maintained). 
```bash
$ git clone -b archive https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3  # archive branch
```
